Quick Overview

Image Credits & Acknowledgments

That Sky Events is a community-created calendar and resource website for Sky: Children of the Light players. This is an unofficial fan project designed to help the Sky community stay informed about events and game information.

Special Recognition

We sincerely acknowledge and thank all contributors to the Sky: Children of the Light Wiki, including administrators, editors, and image uploaders. Their dedication and collaborative effort have made comprehensive documentation possible, serving as an invaluable resource for the Sky community. This project would not have been possible without their hard work and passion.
